section.para: To access the Chart of Accounts, select the "Chart of Accounts" option. The following screen will appear:

The "Chart of Accounts" screen displays information on all existing G/L Account Numbers defined within the application, including Company segment (if used), Profit Center (if used), Account Number, Subaccount Number (if used), Account description, and Account Type. To see inactive Account Numbers, select the "Show Inactive" option.
